imag.crawler.crawler

类 WebCrawler

  • java.lang.Object
    • imag.crawler.crawler.WebCrawler
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Runnable
    直接已知子类:
    BasicCrawler

    public class WebCrawler
extends Object
implements Runnable
    WebCrawler class in the Runnable class that is executed by each crawler thread.
    作者:
    Yasser Ganjisaffar

    • 字段详细资料

      • logger

        protected static final uk.org.lidalia.slf4jext.Logger logger

      • myId

        protected int myId
        The id associated to the crawler thread running this instance

      • myController

        protected CrawlController myController
        The controller instance that has created this crawler thread. This reference to the controller can be used for getting configurations of the current crawl or adding new seeds during runtime.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • WebCrawler

        public WebCrawler()

    • 方法详细资料

      • init

        public void init(int id,
        CrawlController crawlController)
        Initializes the current instance of the crawler
        参数:
        id - the id of this crawler instance
        crawlController - the controller that manages this crawling session

      • getMyId

        public int getMyId()
        Get the id of the current crawler instance
        返回:
        the id of the current crawler instance

      • getMyController

        public CrawlController getMyController()

      • onStart

        public void onStart()
        This function is called just before starting the crawl by this crawler instance. It can be used for setting up the data structures or initializations needed by this crawler instance.

      • onBeforeExit

        public void onBeforeExit()
        This function is called just before the termination of the current crawler instance. It can be used for persisting in-memory data or other finalization tasks.

      • handlePageStatusCode

        protected void handlePageStatusCode(WebURL webUrl,
                        int statusCode,
                        String statusDescription)
        This function is called once the header of a page is fetched. It can be overridden by sub-classes to perform custom logic for different status codes. For example, 404 pages can be logged, etc.
        参数:
        webUrl - WebUrl containing the statusCode
        statusCode - Html Status Code number
        statusDescription - Html Status COde description

      • handleUrlBeforeProcess

        protected WebURL handleUrlBeforeProcess(WebURL curURL)
        This function is called before processing of the page's URL It can be overridden by subclasses for tweaking of the url before processing it. For example, http://abc.com/def?a=123 - http://abc.com/def
        参数:
        curURL - current URL which can be tweaked before processing
        返回:
        tweaked WebURL

      • onPageBiggerThanMaxSize

        protected void onPageBiggerThanMaxSize(String urlStr,
                           long pageSize)
        This function is called if the content of a url is bigger than allowed size.
        参数:
        urlStr - - The URL which it's content is bigger than allowed size

      • onUnexpectedStatusCode

        protected void onUnexpectedStatusCode(String urlStr,
                          int statusCode,
                          String contentType,
                          String description)
        This function is called if the crawler encountered an unexpected http status code ( a status code other than 3xx)
        参数:
        urlStr - URL in which an unexpected error was encountered while crawling
        statusCode - Html StatusCode
        contentType - Type of Content
        description - Error Description

      • onContentFetchError

        protected void onContentFetchError(WebURL webUrl)
        This function is called if the content of a url could not be fetched.
        参数:
        webUrl - URL which content failed to be fetched

      • onParseError

        protected void onParseError(WebURL webUrl)
        This function is called if there has been an error in parsing the content.
        参数:
        webUrl - URL which failed on parsing

      • getMyLocalData

        public Object getMyLocalData()
        The CrawlController instance that has created this crawler instance will call this function just before terminating this crawler thread. Classes that extend WebCrawler can override this function to pass their local data to their controller. The controller then puts these local data in a List that can then be used for processing the local data of crawlers (if needed).
        返回:
        currently NULL

      • run

        public void run()
        指定者:
        run 在接口中 Runnable

      • shouldVisit

        public boolean shouldVisit(Page referringPage,
                  WebURL url)
        Classes that extends WebCrawler should overwrite this function to tell the crawler whether the given url should be crawled or not. The following default implementation indicates that all urls should be included in the crawl.
        参数:
        url - the url which we are interested to know whether it should be included in the crawl or not.
        referringPage - The Page in which this url was found.
        返回:
        if the url should be included in the crawl it returns true, otherwise false is returned.

      • visit

        public void visit(Page page)
        Classes that extends WebCrawler should overwrite this function to process the content of the fetched and parsed page.
        参数:
        page - the page object that is just fetched and parsed.

      • getThread

        public Thread getThread()

      • setThread

        public void setThread(Thread myThread)

      • isNotWaitingForNewURLs

        public boolean isNotWaitingForNewURLs()
